text: Allos is a commune in southeastern France. It is in the Alpes-de-Haute- Provence department in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur region. The Verdon river is in the town. ==Hamlets== * La Beaumelle; * La Beaume; * La Foux; * La Foux d’Allos; * Le Seignus (Bas and Haut); * le Villard (Bas and Haut); * Le Brec Bas et Haut; * Sainte-Brigitte (Basse and Haute); * Le Foreston; * Bouchiers; * La Peyrière (Basse and Haute); * Prémin; * Montgros; * Champrichard; * Le Collet; Category:Communes in Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
title: Allos
